extendedInfo.description: This application is a slideshow of fantastic wallpapers, set them as wallpaper in order to change your smartphone.Move to SD is enabled in this app, now you can also zoom every images with a simple tap on your screen.We want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep the app 100% free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. This will help keep this app 100% free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app. (Drag & Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from:Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/We share data with a service provider, AppLovin Corporation. The use of your data by AppLovin is subject to AppLovin's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. Both policies are available at www.applovin.comWe share data with a service provider, AppLovin Corporation. The use of your data by AppLovin is subject to AppLovin's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
